widgets
Class MTButton

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.components.MTComponent
      widgets.AbstractGUIWidget
          widgets.MTButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent3D, org.mt4j.input.IMTInputEventListener, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
MTCheckButton, StdMTButton
public abstract class MTButton
extends AbstractGUIWidget

This class represents a Button in the GUI context. It handles design parameters, text entries and basic input gestureListeners so that you can easily care about the true work.
Note: Since the MTButton carries its own TapProcessor you don't have to create a new one for this GUI-element.

Version:
20110522
Author:
langenhagen
